workshoptitle: Getting Started with Oracle GoldenGate Veridata

tutorials.title: Introduction to Labs and Workshops
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of the workshops and labs (livelabs).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Install and Configure Oracle GoldenGate Veridata
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to set up the GitHub Development Environment, and install GitHub Desktop

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Multiple Domains
tutorials.description: This lab describes how to create multiple domains in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Setting Up the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata Server on the Oracle WebLogic Platform for High Availability
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to  you how to set up the Oracle GoldenGate Veridata Server (version: 12.2.1.2) deployed on the Oracle Weblogic Platform for High Availability.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Use GitHub Desktop to Commit to the GitHub Repository
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to map a node's private IP address to a public IP address

tutorials.title: Lab 5:  Add GitHub Hosted Labs and Workshop to OHC
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to to use Oracle Learning Library (OLL) administration tools to manage links and how to add a link to an OHC page.
